summary: Encapsulates the configuration of the Layer‑Property Flow (LPF) package, holding hydraulic conductivities, anisotropy, interblock transmissivity methods, layer classifications, storage coefficients, wetting controls, and budget‑saving flags for each model layer, with validation and rendering for MODFLOW input files.
business_intent: Provides groundwater modelers a structured way to define and manage per‑layer flow properties and related options, ensuring accurate and consistent preparation of flow‑related parameters for groundwater simulations.
